entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -30.7°C

Observed at: Marathon Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
